## Checklist

<!-- Please confirm the following before submitting -->

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added tests (if applicable)
- [ ] I have run the test suite and all tests pass
- [ ] I have linted my code with `npm run lint` (or equivalent)
- [ ] I have tested my changes in a development environment
- [ ] I have updated the [CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md) (if applicable)

## Type of Change

<!-- Please check the appropriate option -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Other (please describe)
